analyzed: @471b 'phags pa 'jam dpal phyag 'tshal lo // aom b'a kye te dz'a ya /

original: aom b'a kye sha she sv'a /
analyzed: aom b'a kye sha she sv'a /

original: aom b'a kye kha na dza ye /🔽aom b'a kye ni shtha aa /
analyzed: aom b'a kye kha na dza ye / aom b'a kye ni shtha aa /

original: aom b'a kye ya na ma /
analyzed: aom b'a kye ya na ma /

original: aom b'a kye dam na ma: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang ngo //
analyzed: aom b'a kye dam na ma: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang ngo //
translated: By reciting this very name of noble Mañjuśrī twenty-one times, all the karmic obscurations of the five heinous acts are purified.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so //
translated: The name of noble Mañjuśrī is complete.
